requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Core i5 8600 / Ryzen 5 3500 or equivalent 6 core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For 1080p - 30 FPS at low graphics preset. These requirements will be lowered during the early access phase.
requirements_en.recommended:

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3070 / 6800 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For 1080p 60 FPS at high graphics preset. These requirements will be lowered during the early access phase.
